Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • Object
      • Material
  • public class Material
extends Object
    Creation of the blocks in this class, with their texture and conditions on their destruction As well as future method for force computations
    Author:
    sebastien

      Future method to compute the force it acquires when hit by a projectile
